definition: to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
surname Bu
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
divinatory diagram/one of the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]/one of the sixty-four divinatory hexagrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]

sentences.english: He often practices divination to tell other's fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他常用卜卦的方法幫人占卜未來。

sentences.english: Palmistry claims to know one's future by examining the lines on the palm of one's hand.
sentences.chinese: 看手相的通過觀看手掌的形狀和紋路爲人卜卦。

sentences.english: As with the Augury spell, the mage must declare a target.
sentences.chinese: 和卜卦法術一樣，法師必須宣佈一個目標。

sentences.english: You are to come to wife divination, right?
sentences.chinese: 你是來給老婆卜卦，對嗎？

sentences.english: View complete result, save or print it.
sentences.chinese: 查看卜卦結果，可保存，可打印。

definition: to divine
fortune telling
fortune-telling/to tell fortune
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
to tell fortune by reading the subject's facial features
to tell sb's fortune
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
fortune telling based on the subject's face
divination
fortune-teller
good and bad luck (in astrology)
physiognomy
to predict by divining/to look into the future
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
to divine by astrology/horoscope
fortune-teller who uses the subject's face for his prognostication
